name: Roaat Regular Typographic Features
short_description:
I created a Khmer font. Because Khmer ist quite a descendant of the Brahmi script, adding OpenType and/or AAT (Apple Advanced Typography) features is necessary for realizing the letter rearrangement and reshaping.

Because of the complexity of the Khmer script this task is quite challenging, and I still have problems in making the AAT features work properly. This project is meant to make the development process visible for everyone and allowing others to give valuable hints and comments.
